price: (20) And Iblees had already confirmed through them[1228] his assumption,[1229] so they followed him, except for a party of believers.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ صَدَّقَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ إِبۡلِيسُ ظَنَّهُۥ فَٱتَّبَعُوهُ إِلَّا فَرِيقٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
footnotes:
[1228]- i.e., the people of Saba’ or mankind in general.
[1229]- That mankind could readily be misled by him.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ṣaddaqa ʿalayhim ib'līsu ẓannahu fa-ittabaʿūhu illā farīqan mina al-mu'minīna
